#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
#define sl(l) scanf("%lld",&l)
 
struct point
{
	ll x,y;
}v[100001];
 
 
 
 
int main()
{
	ll t;
	sl(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll a=0,n;
			sl(n);
			for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)sl(v[i].x);
			for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)sl(v[i].y);
			for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)	
			{
					a+=(v[i].x*v[(i+1)%n].y);
					a-=(v[(i+1)%n].x*v[i].y);
			}

		a = abs(a);
		
		printf("%.1lf\n",(float)(a)/2);
 
	}
	return 0;
}
